name: Partnero
author: Partnero

sections.description:
Partnero for WooCommerce

Launch a fully-customized affiliate program to increase customer acquisition and retention.

Partnero is a comprehensive partnership management tool that allows you to boost your store revenue by launching a bespoke affiliate program with a focus on partner experience.

Seamlessly integrate Partnero with WordPress, WooCommerce, and WooCommerce Subscriptions. Start using affiliate marketing to grow your business within minutes.

With Partnero, you can fully customize program settings: adjust commission rates, type & period, cookie lifetime and referral links. Track program performance, manage partner accounts, set individual commission rates, and provide your partners with a white-labeled partner portal.

Key features:

  • Unlimited affiliates and transactions

  • White-label partner portal

  • Automated payouts

  • Automated conversion tracking

  • Fully-customizable reward setup

Explore our complete feature set here.

Please visit our knowledge base or developer documentation to find detailed how-to guides.
sections.installation:
1. Upload plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/partnero directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Go to ‘Partnero’ menu and enter Partnero API Key that can be generated from Integration section over at Partnero.
sections.changelog:
1.3.3

  • Stop order tracking when done from admin.

1.3.2

  • Fix tracking when payment is delayed.
  • Added extra measures to prevent duplicate calls.

1.3.1

  • Style changes for tax option.

1.3.0

  • Added option to include tax in final amount while tracking order.

1.2.0

  • Updated tracking hooks.
  • Added payment hook to tracking as a fallback measure.

1.1.0

  • Multi currency support.

1.0.0

  • Initial release.
sections.screenshots:
1. Review key program metrics and manage your program from the main dashboard.

  2. Decide when and how your partners will be rewarded, finetune every setting, and align the program with your business goals.

  3. Decide how the partner dashboard will look like. Include what’s important, change the layout, and add custom blocks.

  4. Build a unique resource hub and manage it in real-time. Upload various marketing materials, add descriptions, and swap out assets.
sections.reviews:
Great affiliate plugin

By foudistorz on March 19, 2024

I recently acquired Partnero through a fantastic deal on Appsumo, and I'm thrilled to say it's been an excellent investment. Integrating seamlessly with my WooCommerce website, this affiliate plugin has exceeded my expectations in both functionality and ease of use.

What truly sets Partnero apart is its constant evolution. Every month, the team rolls out new features, ensuring the plugin remains at the cutting edge of affiliate marketing technology. This commitment to innovation not only enhances the overall user experience but also significantly contributes to the success of my online business.

I wholeheartedly encourage the Partnero team to continue their impressive work. Their dedication to improving and expanding the plugin's capabilities is not only commendable but also highly beneficial for users like myself who rely on their software for business growth. Kudos to the team for their hard work and dedication!
